1�So that's what magicite looks like.
1�What could they possibly want with it?
1�What the...?
1�Who are you!?
1�The Shadow Lord? It can't be! His powers have returned!
1�You are too late.I have awoken.
1�Your rage, cowardice, envy, arrogance, and apathy... From these I will spread the bane of Vana'diel.
1�Your kind has awoken me...and this time, you will be destroyed!
1�You cannot stop me. Vana'diel will be a grave for you and all your kind!
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Circle of Time.An Understanding Overlord?(pt.1).An Understanding Overlord?(pt.2).An Understanding Overlord?(pt.3).An Understanding Overlord?(pt.4).An Understanding Overlord?(pt.5).An Understanding Overlord?(pt.6).Magicite(pt.1).Magicite(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�Kweh?Kharabom, tspoluhi...!Ahk! What business have you here!?
1�(Though merely exchanging words with a heretic heathen can be punished with an eternity of damnation, the almighty Tzee Xicu will surely forgive me for what I am about to do...)
1�Ahem...kwahk!I am Loo Kohor, servant of Tzee Xicu the Manifest. I have traveled from mighty Castle Oztroja in the mountains of Aragoneu to deliver a message to the Orcs.
1�However, it seems that information of my visit has not been relayed to the lower ranks of the Orcish army.
1�And as you probably already know, the oversized swine do not make a habit of asking many questions before they proceed in prodding you with one of their pointy weapons.
1�Alright.Adventurer, are you not?
1�I hear tales that your type will do just about anything...if the price is right.
1�However, I am not one to judge those who have chosen to walk their path in darkness.I need you to deliver this parchment to the Orcish Overlord. You will be paid upon your return.

1�Second thoughts?While your faith hides behind the temptation of carnal pleasures, those temptations are no match for the cowardice that rots your pitiful soul. Go on, now. Leave this place before you stumble and scratch your knee.
1�Kwahah! Excellent....Hm? Not thinking of walking into Orc lair looking like that, are we?
1�The pathetic barbarians would slice you into ribbons and serve your flesh to the Overlord for supper. A disguise is what you need.
1�Why not skin one of the grunts and use its thick leather to make yourself a mask to hide that repulsive face?
1�I shall be waiting for you here when you have made your preparations.
1�I was wondering when you would return. Now let me see your...
1�Orlmhattjmha!Y-you don't really think you will fool the Orcs with that...that...thing, do you?
1�<Sigh>...However, I guess I have not any choice but to trust you and your plan. Here is the communication you are to deliver.
1�You are to take it and place it within the Overlord's cryptexphere.
1�Again, I will be waiting here for you behind these boulders, but let my will guide your spirit safely through this nest of fiends.
1�What took you so long?I was beginning to worry that you had been...

1�Ahem...kwahk!Here is your reward. Did you believe I would attempt to trick you? I know not your people's beliefs, but it is against the teachings of the almighty Tzee Xicu to break one's promise.
1�What? Are you dissatisfied with your prize? Is this not what you wanted?
1�Now I must be off. Good day!
1�A heretic that keeps ?[his/her] word...Perhaps there still is some hope for the children of Altana...
1�You fool!You bear name Overlord, but do not forget who has true power!
1�My apology, adventurer.I see you are messenger for Yagudo.
1�But I don't understand. Why would child of Altana keep promise to beastman? Why would you risk life for him? You either very brave, very noble, or very stupid. Gahahah!
1�We Orcs have no respect for coward. I'll be first to cut their throat!But we do respect bravery and good fight, whether fighter be enemy or friend!
1�Now, how can I repay you...?
1�Ah! That ugly hat!Put it down on cryptexphere.
1�Gadzradd!Gadzradd! Come now!
1�Starting today, you have new order.You protect this adventurer when ?[he/she] need you.
1�If adventurer use hat, you run to ?[his/her] side and fight to death!
1�Even if ?[he/she] ask you to fight me, you don't step down, or I crush your skull myself!
1�Here's hat. Proof of true bravery worthy of mighty Orc!
1�Use hat to summon Gadzradd. He hides in shadows but comes when you call. No worry about language. Gadzradd speaks your words good.
1�Now I must go, adventurer.
1�You are great warrior, and I salute you. But next time we meet we are enemy. Watch back, or you might be smashed into pulp! Gahahah!
1�Yes, lord...
1�B-but lord...
1�Yes, lord! B-but...
1�U-understood...
1�You place 6???? and 6???? together upon the altar.
1�What say you? Hear my offer?I'm all ears.What? What!?
1�What say you?I'm your ?[man/woman]!Deliver it yourself!
